Polish Nether Quartz. If you have a few amethysts together, you can also make a budding amethyst block and harvest the amethysts from it.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.bamboo_pl: Bamboo Planks can now be crafted in the 2x2 field in your inventory.
Important! The following is essential for the further gameplay.
Hover over an item and either %s or press %s to show its %s or %s or press %s to show its %s.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.blackston: Get Blackstone from a Piglin. You can crush it later to get Coal, which, in compressed form, gives Diamonds when crushed.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.chorus.de: Fertilize Endstone with Desolate Spread for a teleportation plant.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.compost.d: Compost Straw which you get from stripping Bamboo Blocks on a Cutting Board. Then cut you fresh compost with any shovel.%sPut the item to cut in your off hand and the tool in your main hand and hold right click! By the way, Bamboo can be mined instantly with a sword.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.copper_nu: Once you've milled burnt clay balls for copper, you're ready to mix your first brass if you didn't get it from your friends already :)
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.crushed_r: Break Gravel while sneaking to get a few more valuable pebbles.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.dripstone: Wash Limestone to get Dripstone and dry Mud on this.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.electron_: Polish some Rose Quartz and make Electron Tubes by combining it with an Iron Sheet.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.emerald.d: Make granite and mill it to get emeralds out of it.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.empty_bla: Craft a home for your future hot friend.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.end_stone: The Blackstone really needs to cool down a lot...
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.ender_pea: Get Ender Pearls from a Piglin. You will need these later for Ender Jelly.%sBy the way, you can grow Ender Pearls with Ender Seeds.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.flint.des: Cut Rocky Dirt.%sYou can make Flint later by cutting Gravel with a shovel on a Cutting Board. That way, you don't need to compost a huge amount of Straw.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.gold_nugg: Mill burned Clay Blocks and wash the result afterwards.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.grow_flow: Fertilize a Grass Block and look which beautiful flowers grow!
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.honey.des: Let a few Bees move into a Cherry Tree and collect Honey from them.%sYou can get Glass Bottles by drinking fished Water Bottles empty.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.lapis_laz: [Brass needed]: Deploy Blue Dye on Cinder Flour.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.lava.desc: Fill your bucket with 20 super-heated Cobblestones
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.limestone: Make a Cobblestone Generator with Honey (fluid) and Lava (See advancement line with nether stuff).%sTry also other fluids in combination with Lava. Some will react with it, some won't.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.netherite: Put Nether Bricks under a spout, deploy a Sturdy Sheet and Cinder Flour on it and press it. After repeating this 8 times, you will get ... rubble.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.netherrac: Freeze a Magma Block until you can walk on it.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.powder_sn: Build yourself up to the sky and set up a few cauldrons to collect Powder Snow.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.quartz.de: Get Nether Quartz from a Piglin.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.root.desc: Welcome to my Create Skyblock modpack. I've just added a few recipes which make it even possible to get Create's ressources from just one Bamboo! With this advancement guide (%s) I'll guide you threw the first steps from Bamboo to Brass. Good luck!
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.sculk_cat: Put Endstone under a few machines and you have everything you need for Sculk.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.slicer.de: You will probably have quickly realized that you would have to cut a lot of gravel by hand (~120 times) for 1 Crushed Raw Iron, precisely. Let's automate this with a slicer...
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.slime_bal: Slime Balls are basically just lime Dough, right?
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.soul_sand: Get Soul Sand from a Piglin. You need this for haunting.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.spawn_egg: Let the Sniffer sniff for spawn eggs.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.string.de: Mill Flax to make String. This can be used for Fishing Rods or as fabric for Beds.
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.super_hea: Give the blaze in the blaze burner some Biofuel to drink (Straw required).
advancements.create_bamboo_sky.water.des:
Take water from a Rain Gutter.

You can fill a Cauldron with this water now and pour it onto Dirt with a Faucet.
emi.info.sniffer_digging: Can be dug up by a Sniffer.
groups.diet.salt.name: Salt
functions.create_sky.register_player.spa: Turn to determine the position of your island. If the marker is green, you can create the island with %s, if the marker is red, nothing happens.
functions.create_sky.cannot_place_island: You cannot place an island here.
